mean_cn: n. 分析，分解，分析报告，梗概
mean_en: the detailed study or examination of sth in order to understand more about it; the result of the study
deformation_desc: 小写的l就像一根试管，让我们来分析一下里面都装了些什么？
sentence: Could you write up an analysis of how the market is moving this week?
sentence_trans: 你能写篇关于这周市场如何运作的分析报告吗？
